breakingChangesNotes:
• Renamed incident type 'Review Indicators Manually For Whitelisting' to 'Review Indicators Manually For Allowlisting'. This will break references to this incident type where it is used in other packs.
  • Renamed layout 'Review Indicators Manually For Whitelisting Incident' to 'Review Indicators Manually For Allowlisting Incident'. This will break references to this layout where it is used
  • Renamed playbook 'TIM - Review Indicators Manually For Whitelisting' to 'TIM - Review Indicators Manually For Allowlisting'. This will break references to this playbook where it is used.
  • Changed indicator tag value 'approved_white' to 'approved_allow' and 'approved_black' to 'approved_block'.
